triangle.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a flat shape with three straight sides and three angles
triangle.translation[0].definitions[1].d: something that is shaped like a triangle
triangle.translation[0].definitions[2].d: a musical instrument made of metal bent into the shape of a triangle. You hit it with a metal stick to make a ringing sound.
